description:
Setting a quota 'value' param to a module appears to produce a deepcopy failure in string interpolation in some cases.  I'm not clear on exact environments fail as I saw this test succeed on some machines, but fail on another.

http://paste.openstack.org/show/48311/
title: Quota sets v3 non int value test error
